Charles:

(This should really be on a log4j l=
ist, but oh well...)


I think this is because you are setting your root lo=
g level to info:
log4j.rootLogger=3Dinfo, stdout, file

Whereas your app lo=
gs are set to debug - so they don't have an
appender to go to.  Have you tr=
ied setting the root level to debug?
